# rdp_holiday
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ceR4TDuqE5A

#Install
```pip3 install git+https://github.com/wmetcalf/rdp_holiday.git -U```

```
rdp_holiday -i /home/coz/Downloads/bad.rdp -o bad.json
cat bad.json | jq
```
